body_html:
1. yay for building!

  2. So as written, we now use the system default as the default, even in Docker/Jenkins, correct? So we would need to just install cudnn V4 on our docker instance and we'll start testing that version?

I think this looks good to me, but still want @zheng-xq to take a look :)

body:
1) yay for building!

2) So as written, we now use the system default as the default, even in Docker/Jenkins, correct?  So we would need to just install cudnn V4 on our docker instance and we'll start testing that version?

I think this looks good to me, but still want @zheng-xq to take a look :)
